text: Gavin Earl Edwards (born January 15, 1988) is a US-born Japanese professional basketball player for Chiba Jets Funabashi in Japan. == Career statistics == |- | align="left" | 2013-14 | align="left" | Aisin | 53|| 12|| 23.6|| 60.7|| 50.0|| 64.7|| 8.1|| 1.0|| 0.5|| 1.8|| 13.9 |- | align="left" | 2014-15 | align="left" | Aisin | 54||5 || 22.9|| 63.8|| 20.0|| 66.0|| 7.9|| 1.3|| 0.8|| 1.9|| 13.8 |- | align="left" | 2015-16 | align="left" | Aisin | 53||13|| 25.3|| 57.8|| 36.4|| 71.6|| 7.8|| 1.4|| 0.8|| 1.8|| 15.0 |- | align="left" | 2016-17 | align="left" | Mikawa | 60 || 16 || 26.0 || 54.5 || 29.2 || 68.8 || 7.5 || 1.5 || 0.8 || 1.2 || 14.6 |- | align="left" | 2017-18 | align="left" | Chiba |60 || 59 ||29.0 || 60.9 ||25.7 || 64.4 || 7.7 || 2.8 ||0.9 ||1.2 || 18.1 |} ==Personal== His father, Earl Edwards is a former American football player. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Greece Category:American expatriate basketball people in Japan Category:American expatriate basketball people in Malaysia Category:American expatriate basketball people in Ukraine Category:American men's basketball players Category:Anyang KGC players Category:Basketball players from Arizona Category:BC Khimik players Category:Chiba Jets Funabashi players Category:Peristeri B.C. players Category:SeaHorses Mikawa players Category:Springfield Armor players Category:UConn Huskies men's basketball players Category:Kuala Lumpur Dragons players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Power forwards (basketball)
